page.title: 05LOCHALSH TOURIST BOARD
page.content: The Local Tourist Board helps expand tourism by selling the area through books and leaflets.It directs visitors to the right places,to see and do the right things.It is an information giver-timetables for trains and buses, local restaurants, hotels and bed and breakfast.Staff in the Tourist Board Information Centre are bilingual to help foreign tourists.Holiday homes, Hotels and bed and breakfast places can be registered with the Tourist Association.This helps make reservations for the owners.The tourists help finance the tourist board by buying leaflets and books, staying in hotels and holiday homes. The Highlands and Island Development Board adds support through a grant. Any Tourist Office can ring another in Scotland and make a booking in that area.
